Trifluoperazine, sold under the brand name Stelazine among others, is a typical antipsychotic primarily used to treat schizophrenia.[1] It is also used, short term, for generalized anxiety disorder but is less preferred to benzodiazepines and use for nausea.[1] It is taken by mouth.[1]
